author: Al Jazeera
title: Italy posts more grim coronavirus records as deaths, cases rise
description: Italy has more virus-related deaths than any other country in the world, with the latest death toll at 9,134.
content: Italy has posted more grim records related to the new coronavirus, becoming on Friday the second country after the United States to overtake China in terms of infections as it announced almost 1,000 deaths in a day - a worldwide record since the epidemic bega… [+2190 chars]
